title: Process Hidden Fees
description: With your aid, you can process additional taxes, fees, and payments. Attempt a basic Trade check to determine what sorts of additional resources you gather.

criticalSuccess.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="2">Gain 2 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

success.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>, but the citizens suspect something is going on: if you attempt to Process Hidden Fees on the next Kingdom turn, the result is worsened one degree.

failure.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>, but the citizens catch wind of the fees and grow unhappy. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button>, and you cannot Process Hidden Fees on your next Kingdom turn.

criticalFailure.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>, but the citizens catch wind of the fees and grow unhappy. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d6">Gain 1d6 Unrest</button>, and you cannot Process Hidden Fees on your next Kingdom turn.
